title: Инструменты кодирования
description: Профессиональные инструменты кодирования и декодирования для разработчиков

hash.name: Хеш-калькулятор
hash.description: MD5, SHA1, SHA256 и другие алгоритмы хеширования

hex.name: Hex-конвертер
hex.description: Преобразование между текстом и шестнадцатеричным форматом

meta.title: Инструменты кодирования - Онлайн-конвертер кодирования и декодирования
meta.description: Бесплатные инструменты кодирования для Base64, URL, хеша, JWT, QR-кода, изображений и др. Быстро, безопасно и просто онлайн.

base64.title: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
base64.description: Convert text to Base64 format or decode Base64 back to text

encode.title: Text Encoding
encode.description: Convert plain text to Base64 format

decode.title: Base64 Decoding
decode.description: Convert Base64 format back to plain text

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.encode_desc: Convert plain text to Base64 format, supports Chinese and special characters.
instructions.decode_desc: Convert Base64 format back to original text.
instructions.file_desc: You can upload files for Base64 encoding.
instructions.notes_desc: Base64 encoding increases data size by approximately 33%.

errors.encode_failed: Encoding failed: Input contains invalid characters
errors.decode_failed: Decoding failed: Input is not valid Base64 format

meta.title: Base64 Encoder Decoder - Online Text Image Converter
meta.description: Free Base64 encode/decode tool for text, images, and files. Fast, secure, and easy to use for developers and daily tasks.

encode.title: URL Encoding
encode.description: Convert text to URL-safe encoding format

decode.title: URL Decoding
decode.description: Convert URL encoding format back to original text

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.url_encoding_desc: Convert special characters to %XX format to ensure URL safety.
instructions.use_cases_desc: URL parameters, form submission, API calls, etc.
instructions.notes_desc: Some characters have special meanings in URLs and need to be encoded.

errors.invalid_url: This is not a complete URL

meta.title: URL Encoder Decoder - Online Parameter Converter
meta.description: Free URL encode/decode tool supporting Chinese and special characters. Perfect for web development and API parameter conversion.

hash.title: Hash Calculator
hash.description: Calculate hash values using various algorithms

input.title: Input Content
input.description: Enter text content to calculate hash

instructions.title: Algorithm Description
instructions.md5_desc: 128-bit hash algorithm, fast but less secure, mainly used for data integrity verification.
instructions.sha1_desc: 160-bit hash algorithm, more secure than MD5 but still has collision risks.
instructions.sha256_desc: 256-bit hash algorithm, widely used secure hash algorithm.
instructions.sha512_desc: 512-bit hash algorithm, provides the highest level of security.
instructions.salt_desc: Add random string before hash calculation to improve security.

errors.empty_input: Please enter content to calculate hash

meta.title: Hash Calculator - MD5 SHA256 SHA512 Online Encryption Tool
meta.description: Multi-algorithm hash calculator supporting MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA512, file and salt encryption.

jwt.title: JWT Tools
jwt.description: JWT token decoding, validation and generation tools

generate.title: Generate JWT Token
generate.description: Generate JWT token with custom payload and secret
generate.privateKeyPlaceholder: Enter private key for RSA/ECDSA/EdDSA algorithms (JWK or PEM format)...

decode.title: JWT Decoding
decode.description: Decode JWT token and validate its signature
decode.verificationDescription: Leave empty for decode only, fill secret or public key for verification
decode.publicKeyPlaceholder: Enter public key for RSA/ECDSA/EdDSA algorithms (JWK or PEM format)...

errors.unsupported_algorithm: RSA, ECDSA and EdDSA algorithms require key pairs, currently only HMAC algorithms are supported. Please select HS256, HS384 or HS512.

meta.title: JWT Tools - Online Decode Validate and Generate Token
meta.description: Online JWT decode, signature validation, and token generation. Supports multiple algorithms for development and debugging.

hex.title: Hex Converter
hex.description: Convert between text and hexadecimal format

text_to_hex.title: Text to Hexadecimal
text_to_hex.input_placeholder: Enter text to convert to hex...

hex_to_text.title: Hexadecimal to Text
hex_to_text.description: Convert hexadecimal format back to text

binary.title: Binary Converter
binary.description: Convert between text and binary format
binary.text_input_placeholder: Enter text to convert to binary...

instructions.title: Conversion Instructions
instructions.text_to_hex_desc: Each character is converted to its ASCII/Unicode hexadecimal representation.
instructions.hex_to_text_desc: Hexadecimal values are converted back to their corresponding characters.
instructions.binary_desc: Each character is converted to its 8-bit binary representation.
instructions.format_desc: Hex values can be separated by spaces or colons for better readability.
instructions.use_cases_desc: Data analysis, debugging, low-level programming, network protocols.

meta.title: Hex Converter - Online Text Binary Encoding Tool
meta.description: Convert between text, hex, and binary. Ideal for data analysis, low-level development, and protocol debugging.

json.title: JSON Formatter
json.description: Format, validate and beautify JSON data

format.title: JSON Formatting
format.description: Format JSON data with proper indentation

instructions.title: JSON Description
instructions.formatting_desc: Add proper indentation and line breaks to make JSON readable.
instructions.validation_desc: Check if JSON syntax is correct and structure is valid.
instructions.compression_desc: Remove all unnecessary whitespace to reduce file size.
instructions.syntax_desc: Keys must be strings, values can be strings, numbers, booleans, null, objects, or arrays.
instructions.use_cases_desc: API development, data exchange, configuration files, web applications.

meta.title: JSON Formatter - Online Beautify Compress and Validate
meta.description: Format, beautify, compress, and validate JSON data. Syntax highlighting and error detection for API development and data processing.

image.title: Image Encoder
image.description: Convert images to Base64 and other formats

encode.title: Image to Base64
encode.description: Convert image files to Base64 format
encode.supported_formats: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP, SVG

decode.title: Base64 to Image
decode.description: Convert Base64 data back to image

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.image_to_base64_desc: Upload an image file to convert it to Base64 format. The converted data can be used in HTML, CSS, or other web technologies.
instructions.base64_to_image_desc: Paste Base64 encoded image data to convert it back to an image and preview it.
instructions.supported_formats_desc: Supported image formats include JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP, and SVG.
instructions.file_limit_desc: Maximum file size is 5MB for optimal performance.
instructions.use_cases_desc: Useful for embedding images in HTML emails, CSS backgrounds, or when you need to include images without external file dependencies.

upload.title: Upload Image
upload.description: Upload an image to convert to Base64 format
upload.drag_drop: Drag and drop image here, or click to select
upload.supported_formats: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP, SVG

meta.title: Image Base64 Encoder - Online Image Format Converter
meta.description: Convert images to Base64 encoding. Supports multiple formats and output options for web development.

qr.title: Генератор QR-кодов
qr.description: Создание настраиваемых QR-кодов и декодирование существующих QR-кодов

meta.title: Генератор QR-кодов - Онлайн создатель QR
meta.description: Бесплатный инструмент для генерации и декодирования QR-кодов, совместимый с текстом, URL, WiFi, контактами и другими форматами, с настройкой стиля и уровня коррекции ошибок.

generate.title: Создать QR-код
generate.description: Создайте настраиваемый QR-код с различными опциями

logo.title: Пользовательский логотип
logo.format_hint: Поддерживаемые форматы: PNG, JPG, SVG. Рекомендуемый размер: 48x48px
logo.error_correction_hint: При использовании логотипа рекомендуется высокий уровень коррекции (H)

decode.title: Декодировать QR-код
decode.description: Загрузите изображение QR-кода для извлечения содержимого
decode.supported_formats: Поддерживаемые форматы: PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF, BMP

examples.title: Быстрые примеры
examples.vcard:
BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
FN:Иван Иванов
TEL:+79123456789
END:VCARD

instructions.title: Инструкция по использованию
instructions.content_desc: Можно вводить текст, URL, числа, WiFi, контакты и др.
instructions.size_desc: Размер влияет на разрешение и читаемость QR-кода. Рекомендуется: 256-512px.
instructions.error_correction_desc: Высокий уровень позволяет считывать даже частично поврежденные коды.
instructions.types_desc: URL, текст, числа, WiFi, контакты, GPS-координаты и др.

qr_styles.title: Стили QR-кода
qr_styles.with_logo: С логотипом - QR-код с логотипом в центре

logo_tips.title: Советы по логотипу
logo_tips.format: Используйте PNG или SVG для лучшего качества
logo_tips.error_correction: При логотипе используйте высокий уровень коррекции (H)

errors.empty_content: Пожалуйста, введите содержимое для генерации QR-кода
errors.invalid_format: Недопустимый формат файла. Пожалуйста, выберите изображение.

text_to_hex.input_placeholder: Enter text to convert to hex...

hex_to_text.description: Convert hexadecimal format back to text
